docs.lead_paragraph: June Kahn, whose infected molar has been hurting her so badly she has eaten scarcely any solid food for days, is about to have her tooth extracted.

docs.lead_paragraph: ALOS ANGELES businessman asked the airline agent to give him a seat "as far as possible from the smoking sections be cause smoke makes me cough."
